articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Belgian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Belgian King
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Philippe, king of Belgium, on its national day.
					 The message wished the Kingdom of Belgium prosperity.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Greets o Belgian FM
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Greets o Belgian FM
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a message of greeting to Didier Reynders, deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Belgium, on its national day.
					 The message wished Didier Reynders success in his work, expressing expectation that the exchange and cooperation between the two foreign ministries for promoting mutual understanding and developing the bilateral relations would reach a due level.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets Indian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had a talk with Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Jasminder Kasturia who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.
					 The foreign minister referred to the principled stand of the DPRK on the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula at present.
					
					 He praised the positive efforts made by the ambassador to boost the bilateral relations developing favorably day by day, and expressed expectation that the relations between the DPRK and India would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 The ambassador wished Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, good health and the government and people of the DPRK progress and prosperity.
					
					 The ambassador expressed the will to further develop the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition in various fields.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S. for Finding Fault with DPRK's Ballistic Rocket Firing Drill
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slams U.S. for Finding Fault with DPRK's Ballistic Rocket Firing Drill
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday in connection with the fact that the U.S. found fault with the ballistic rocket firing drill conducted by the Korean People's Army:
					 Official figures of the White House and the State and Defense Departments of the U.S. are branding the ballistic rocket firing drill conducted by the Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the KPA as "violation of resolution" of the UN Security Council and "provocation".
					
					 The U.S. action reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" as it took issue with the routine military rehearsal of the KPA.
					
					 The U.S. has to look back on the fact that it is posing a grave threat to the DPRK with nuclear weapons after bringing to south Korea all types of strategic assets, before slandering others.
					
					 The unceasing arms buildup and nuclear war drills of the U.S. are real threats to the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and a wanton violation of the UN Charter and international law.
					
					 Just like a robber shaking his fist at the owner after breaking into his house, the U.S. is accusing the DPRK of its legitimate countermeasure for self-defence. This is an intolerable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 With the joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian scheduled in coming August at hand, the U.S. is steadily escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 There is no guarantee that the saber-rattling which the U.S. plans to stage with the coming joint military exercises as an occasion would not lead to igniting the fuse of a nuclear war.
					
					 The spokesman warned that the U.S. will be made to face a prompt, merciless and deadly nuclear retaliation if it plays with fire on the peninsula despite the repeated warnings by the DPRK.
					
					 Some countries about to side with the U.S. should take unbiased stand with a clear understanding of the nature of the situation and contribute to ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world, the spokesman stressed.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks at Asia-Europe Summit Slammed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks at Asia-Europe Summit Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye at the recent Asia-European summit in Mongolia cried out for "denuclearization of the north" and "right changes." She made mean solicitation for "enforcement of sanctions measures".
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK in a statement Thursday dismissed her recent despicable behavior as just a repetition of her sickening conduct which the international community is used to witness during her every foreign trip as it only disclosed once again the true nature of confrontation-minded woman steeped in inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward her fellow countrymen in the north to the marrow of her bones.
					
					 She has made over 20 foreign tours since she took power during which she spouted stereo-typed confrontational rhetoric hurting her fellow countrymen in the north and made a spectacle of herself, clean indifferent who the opposite party is and what the agenda item is to be discussed, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 But no matter how mischievous Park may become, the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK for self-defence has been remarkably bolstered to be a treasured sword meeting the desperate challenge of the hostile forces and firmly guaranteeing the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and a powerful weapon for ensuring peace and stability in Northeast Asia, to say nothing of the Korean peninsula. What's more, the international "cooperation" which Park has touted so vociferously is now proving more bankrupt than ever before. This is a hard reality today.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the recent trip of Park must be called the one to escape protest of the south Koreans angered by the humiliating decision to deploy THAAD and to evade public criticism.
					
					 Traitor Park roamed about abroad like a rabid dog while slandering her fellow countrymen after reducing south Korea to a mayhem. She is a trouble-maker and malignant tumor which all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad have to eliminate at an early date.
					
					 So pitiful is Park as she makes desperate efforts to do harm to her fellow countrymen, touring this or that country, being unaware of how much the international community snubs and rejects her.
					
					 Great irony is that Park who is finding herself in the abyss of ruin, being driven into a tight corner inside and outside, openly revealed her attempt at "unification through absorption" while making such remarks that "unification is the way of recovering freedom and human rights of someone and a starting point in building a world without nuclear weapons", being unaware of where she stands.
					
					 Should the puppet group ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. while dreaming of "achieving the unification of social systems", we will mercilessly wipe out the provocateurs through a great and just war for reunification and achieve reunification of our own style. This is our firm stand.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Koreans today are strongly demanding Park step down as early as possible before the nation faces greater disaster, saying it is sickening to have just a glance at her.
					
					 What awaits Park adding to her high treasons is only a stern punishment by history, warned the statement.

articles.title: Emergency Measure Committee Spokesman Slams Vicious International Terrorism of Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Emergency Measure Committee Spokesman Slams Vicious International Terrorism of Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Emergency Measure Committee for Rescuing Abducted Persons on Thursday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet regime is keeping the women citizens of the DPRK abducted by it away from any contact with outside under the pretext of "personal safety " of the families of the abductees:
					 Progressive organizations of people from all walks of life in south Korea including the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the office of the UN high commissioner for Human Rights asked for interviews with the abductees of the DPRK, but the puppet regime turned it down under the pretext of "personal safety " of the families of the victims.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet regime let human scum talk such nonsense that if the "women, who voluntarily defected from the north," are opened to public, their families in the north would be in danger.
					
					 What the regime claimed is nothing but sheer sophism to prevent the disclosure of the truth about its thrice-cursed group allurement and abduction of women of the DPRK.
					
					 At the families' earnest request, we strongly demanded the south Korean puppet authorities on several occasions allow their families to go to Seoul via Panmunjom to have face-to-face meeting with their children.
					
					 The families are now repeatedly calling on the south Korean puppet regime to allow them to meet their children, greatly angered by its continued detention of their children under the pretext of "group defection according to their free will."
					
					 This notwithstanding, the puppet group is vocal about "personal safety" of the families of the abductees. This is an intolerable insult to them and cheap propaganda aimed to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 Had the puppet forces not abducted citizens of the DPRK, why would they have failed to make public the fate of the abductees and even refused to meet the request for informal interview with them made by international human rights organizations even today after the lapse of three months since they were taken to south Korea?
					
					 As clearly disclosed through the press conference with a stooge of the puppet Intelligence Service who was recently spotted and arrested in the DPRK, the puppet group has gone frantic in its smear campaign against the DPRK while appeasing and deceiving citizens of the DPRK and alluring and abducting them to south Korea and then misleading the public opinion by describing it as "voluntary defection from the north".
					
					 The puppet group is resorting to sleight of hand such as "personal safety" of families of abductees in a bid to justify its vicious act of putting them in custody and keeping them away from contact with outside. But it can never cover up its true colors as a group of international terrorists and human rights abusers.
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable is the hideous unethical and treacherous crime of the puppet group that is forcing their children to be separated from their parents against their will and seeking to make them fall victim to the farce of confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet group has to immediately stop the unbearable mental and physical persecution of the woman citizens of the DPRK and cruel "defection operation" and send them back to the embrace of the DPRK unconditionally.
					
					 We will continue to press for proactive measures to roundly disclose the truth behind the group abduction committed by the puppet group and realize the repatriation of the abductees.

articles.title: Officials of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visit Egyptian Embassy
articles.content:
Officials of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visit Egyptian Embassy
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Vice-Minister Sin Hong Chol and other officials of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK paid a congratulatory visit to the Egyptian Embassy here on Thursday on the 64th anniversary of the July 23 revolution in Egypt and had a talk with Ambassador Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed. 
					 The vice-minister congratulated friends of Egypt on the 64th anniversary of the July 23 revolution, its national holiday, and referred to the big successes the Egyptian people have achieved in all fabrics of the society since the victory of the revolution.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are steadily growing stronger under the deep concern of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, he noted.
					
					 The ambassador expressed thanks for the congratulatory visit paid by officials of the Foreign Ministry, noting that he was pleased with the big successes made by the DPRK in the building an economic giant, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 He said that Egypt would always remember the support and encouragement rendered by the Workers' Party, government and people of Korea to Egypt at the cost of blood during the October, 1973 war and boost the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two counties in all fields.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Distinguished Services
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Distinguished Services
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Winner of the Kim Il Sung Prize and People's Athlete Choe Suk Myong, director of the Korean Mass Gymnastic Production Company, on her 70th birthday, and Candidate Academician, Prof. and Dr. Jon Chol Rye, researcher of Hamhung University of Hydraulic Engineering, and Dr. and Associate Prof. Kim Jae Bom, teacher of Hamhung University of Medicine, who are merited scientists, on their 80th birthdays.
					 Choe Suk Myong grown to be a mass gymnastic producer under the trust and love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il devoted her wisdom and efforts to producing and disseminating art works of national treasure.
					
					 She received commendation from the President in January, Juche 62 (1973) when she was in her twenties. She made contribution to producing monumental works including the grand mass gymnastics and artistic performance "Arirang," a winner of the Kim Il Sung Prize.
					
					 Jon Chol Rye was born in a remote northern mountainous village. He grew to be a prestigious scientist in the field of hydraulic engineering of the country under the care of the President after the country's liberation.
					
					 He devoted himself to science and education and produced valuable research successes conducive to building hydro-power station and reclaiming tideland.
					
					 Kim Jae Bom, who was born into a family of a poor farmer in Suan County before the liberation of the country, had his hope to learn fully realized under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and dedicated himself to the study of medical science and research and education for the rising generation.
					
					 For more than five decades, he solved the scientific and technical problems conducive to promoting the health of the people, wrote tens of kinds of textbooks and reference books and cultivated holders of academic degrees and titles.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation and Exhibition in Field of Mining Industry Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation and Exhibition in Field of Mining Industry Held
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation and exhibition in the field of mining industry took place here on July 20 and 21 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, teachers, researchers, technicians and graduate students and three-revolution team members of the Ministry of Mining Industry, the Central Mining Research Institute and the Ferrous Mining Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Tanchon Mining Research Institute and other units.
					
					 Presented to the presentation, divided into excavating, dressing and machine panels, were more than 150 valuable papers on research achievements conducive to developing the mining industry, building economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition were achievement data.

articles.title: Swimming Contest of University Teachers and Students Held
articles.content:
Swimming Contest of University Teachers and Students Held
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- There took place a swimming contest of university teachers and students in Pyongyang at the swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University from July 19 to 21.
					 Participating in the contest were 360 swimmers selected from more than 10 universities in the city including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang University of Printing.
					
					 Teachers competed in men's and women's 50 meters breaststroke and 50 meters freestyle swimming events and 4×50 meters mixed relay swimming event while students in men's and women's 100 meters backstroke, breaststroke, freestyle and Chollima-style swimming events and 4×100 meters mixed relay swimming event.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University came first in the team standings at the teachers and students competitions.

articles.title: New Sightseeing Course Built in Mt. Myohyang
articles.content:
New Sightseeing Course Built in Mt. Myohyang
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- From olden times, Mt. Myohyang has been known to be one of six famous mountains and one of eight scenic spots in Korea.
					 Recently, a new sightseeing course was completed between Isonnam Falls in Chonthae Valley of Habiro area to 12-storied falls in the mountain.
					
					The course is 1,000 meters long and there are more than 40 picturesque sites along it together with rest places.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Turf Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Turf Held
 Pyongyang. July 21 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of turf was held at the Turf Institute of the State Academy of Sciences on July 20 and 21 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, technicians, teachers and graduate students of Kim Il Sung University, the Turf Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, the Haeju Turf Institute, Wonsan University of Agriculture and other units.
					
					 The participants heard more than 30 valuable papers on breeding new species of turf which remains green all the year round and strong in resistance and creating lawn and manuring and cultivating it.
					
					 There took place a lecture on technical problems in creating and tending lawn in the rainy season and on preventing damage by harmful insects.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Historic Site Associated with Fatherland Liberation War
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Historic Site Associated with Fatherland Liberation War
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Thursday visited the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War on the 63rd anniversary of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Members of the military attaches corps paid tribute to the photo of President Kim Il Sung in the revolutionary museum.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President led the Korean army and people to repel the U.S. imperialists and honorably protect the country's destiny and nation's sovereignty during his stay there, the guests looked round the supreme command post, operation room, etc.
					
					 They also watched historical relics which tell about leader Kim Jong Il who cultivated wisdom and grit as the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu beside a table for operational plans at the supreme command during the war.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese Embassy Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps wrote that the people's just fight is sure to triumph, whereas the aggressors are bound to suffer a defeat. He hoped that the Korean People's Army (KPA) would achieve bigger successes in the defense of the country and socialist construction under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Bahram Ghanbari Chelarasi, military attache of the Iranian Embassy, extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, on the war victory day.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Regime's THAAD Deployment as Act of Toeing U.S. Strategy of Hegemony
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Regime's THAAD Deployment as Act of Toeing U.S. Strategy of Hegemony
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities' decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea is a reckless act of driving the north-south relations and situation on the Korean peninsula into the extreme phase of tension and a treacherous act of leaving the peninsula as a theatre of nuclear war of big powers, pursuant to the U.S. strategy for world domination. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article.
					 Noting that the north-south relations are now at rock- bottom, the article goes on:
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the reckless move to deploy THAAD at a time when distrust and confrontation between the north and the south reached an extreme phase would escalate the military tension on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase and drive the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 The south Korean authorities claim that THAAD does not target the third country but is aimed at coping with "nuclear and missile threat from the north." However, it is sheer sophism.
					
					 As recognized by public at home and abroad, THAAD deployment in south Korea is to meet the U.S. strategic purpose to hold supremacy in Northeast Asia and contain countries around the Korean peninsula with a military edge.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is playing the role of dirty lackeys in carrying out in the U.S. strategy for hegemony without any principle. It is the act of unhesitatingly sacrificing the interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 Only stern punishment by the times and the nation awaits those who are resorting to sycophancy towards the U.S. and treachery, going against the will and demand of the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Event to Mark Anniversary of SDF
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Event to Mark Anniversary of SDF
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries held an event marking the anniversary of the "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) in their embassy in Seoul for the past two years for fear of protests of south Koreans, but they held it at a hotel in Seoul on July 12.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Thursday says that this is intolerable mockery and insult to the Korean nation.
					
					 The aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries in holding the event in Seoul was aimed to calm down the mounting anti-Japanese sentiments of the south Korean people and lay a springboard for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 What irritates Koreans is that the Japanese reactionaries are citing "threat" from the DPRK in a bid to justify the criminal farce.
					
					 Recently Japan held a confab with the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime over the issue of the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 They even staged a ballistic missile defense combined exercise, the first of its kind, stressing the need to "share more military information about the north" and "verify the cooperation capability."
					
					 It is the calculation of the Japanese reactionaries to take an adamant action for reinvasion, watching for a chance in pursuance of the U.S. scenario to tighten the triangular military alliance.
					
					 They should, however, bear in mind.
					
					 They can never succeed in their underhand scheme to realize their scenario to stage a comeback to Korea step by step under the cloak of an event in league with the puppet regime.
					
					 The DPRK today is no longer what used to be in the past.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely force Japan, their sworn enemy, to pay for its past crimes and get the pent-up grudge of the nation settled.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop their reckless action, well aware that the above-said event will get them nowhere.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Accuse Regime of Suppressing Public Protest against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Accuse Regime of Suppressing Public Protest against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea voiced opposition to the regime's suppression of Songju County residents' protest against THAAD deployment.
					 The floor leader of the Minju Party at a press conference on July 18 said to start an investigation into the case in which inhabitants of Songju County held back the "prime minister" and his party is a stereotyped measure reminiscent of creating the customary atmosphere of suppression.
					
					 Before severely punishing the protesters, the regime should acknowledge its wrong deed of unilaterally choosing the site for THAAD deployment without any communication with residents, and pay attention to the feelings of angry residents, he added.
					
					 The deputy spokesman for the party noted that people's mindset was well known through the "prime minister's" trip to Songju County.
					
					 THAAD deployment is related to the life and security of people and their means of living and, therefore, the argument on it cannot be stopped at the instruction of the "president," he added.
					
					 A spokesman for the Kukmin Party urged the regime to seriously reflect on what it did wrong over the fact that the "prime minister" in charge of state affairs was pelted with water bottles.

articles.title: Religious Circle in Songju County Opposes Decision to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
Religious Circle in Songju County Opposes Decision to Deploy THAAD 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The religious circle in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, south Korea is staging an action in protest against the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea, according to the south Korean CBS on July 18.
					 The Songju Christian Federation posted on its website an article to the effect that it together with inhabitants in the county are dead-set against THAAD deployment.
					
					 It decided to conduct a signature campaign among believers, putting up a placard opposing THAAD deployment.
					
					 Religionists in Songju said that the regime disclosed its half-baked and incompetent nature by unilaterally deciding to deploy THAAD without seeking any understanding from the inhabitants despite the danger of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Koreans Protest against GIs' War Drill
articles.content:
S. Koreans Protest against GIs' War Drill
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Residents, city "assemblymen" and other people of south Korea staged actions of Phochon, Kyonggi Province on July 17 in protest against GIs' war drills, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 GIs reportedly hurled scores of tanks and armored cars into a drill ground in the city for staging a firing drill that day.
					
					 Citizens gathered near a road to a drill ground to stage a demo in protest against the arrogance of GIs.
					
					 They strongly denounced the GIs side for not keeping the promise made to scale down the drill and inform them in advance of its schedule.
					
					 They urged the GIs side to take fundamental measures that can be understandable, not frequently moving its drill ground around.
					
					 GIs should not mock the citizens but make a sincere apology, they demanded.
					
					 That day the puppet police booked the demonstrators on the unreasonable charges of blocking the maneuver of GIs with trucks.

articles.title: We Don't Need THAAD: S. Korean Peasants
articles.content:
We Don't Need THAAD: S. Korean Peasants
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The North Kyongsang Provincial Branch of the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a press conference outside the Songju County Office on July 19 demanding withdrawal of the plan to deploy THAAD, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 People in not only the county but also all parts of south Korea are enraged by the unilateral and surprise decision of the regime to deploy THAAD in the county, the organization noted, adding:
					
					 THAAD will give no help to security of south Korea but will cause serious threat to peace in Northeast Asia including the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is just the peasants who always suffer the biggest losses due to regime's pretext of "state interests" and "security."
					
					 The organization urged the regime to retract the deployment plan at once.

articles.title: S. Korean CBS Discloses Scandal of Chief Prosecutor
articles.content:
S. Korean CBS Discloses Scandal of Chief Prosecutor
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief prosecutor abused his power for committing a series of corruption and irregularities, sparking public uproar, according to CBS of south Korea on July 18.
					 He was reportedly bribed to be involved in stock marketing and embezzled 12 billion won.
					
					 The suspicion that a Chongwadae chief secretary might be involved in the scandal is causing a sensation among the south Korean public.

articles.title: S. Koreans Protest against Projected THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Koreans Protest against Projected THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- S. Koreans of various circles in South Kyongsang Province continue their struggle against deployment of THAAD, according to the south Korean on-line newspaper Oh My News on July 19.
					 The Jinju Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration noted that the decision on THAAD deployment will become a typically unfair convention as south Korea should offer land and upkeep for the MD system to be operated by the U.S.
					
					 The South Kyongsang Provincial Progressive Federation, the South Kyongsang Provincial Emergency Situation Council for Peace against War and other provincial bodies are sponsoring actions against deployment of THAAD in Changwon, Jinju, Kimhae and other parts of the province every day.
					
					 In Changwon the demonstrators are denouncing the humiliating behavior of the regime.
					
					  Demos and rally and information service are also brisk in Jinju and Ryangsan.

articles.title: British Organization Praises Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
British Organization Praises Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article titled "Great General Kim Jong Un" on its website on July 15, illustrated with his photo.
					 Four years have passed since Kim Jong Un, tender-hearted father of the Korean nation and the great guardian of world peace and justice, was awarded the title of the DPRK Marshal, the article said.
					
					 The past four years were the glorious days during which the Korean people have achieved victories and demonstrated honor under the guidance of the iron-willed brilliant commander by smashing every desperate move of the world reactionaries to destroy the fortress of independence and justice unique on the earth, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialists standing on the beeline of ruin are making a last-ditch offensive against socialist Korea.
					
					 Dark clouds of nuclear war gathered over the small Korean peninsula many times but they couldn't cover the blue sky of the DPRK.
					
					 The great brilliant commander who leads Korea of justice always won one victory after another.
					
					 Therefore, the Korean people are leading a proud life as independent guards bringing hope to the world people languishing under the imperialist tyranny as they uphold Kim Jong Un as their leader and father.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Articles were posted on the websites of foreign countries and an international organization from July 1 to 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Agence Congolaise d'Information posted articles and photos documenting the positive aid the President rendered to the African people for their building of new society, illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, kind-hearted image" that the President is remembered by the world progressive people though it is 22 years since he passed away, adding his kind-hearted image will be deeply cherished in the hearts of humankind.
					
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship and the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus posted a photo of the President with the articles titled "22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung", "For global independence" and "Peerlessly great man."
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted articles titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun", "Kim Il Sung, great man of century", "Beaming smile" and "President Kim Il Sung and a Japanese". The articles said beaming smile of the President would be immortal together with the DPRK making a leap forward under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Mexican National Seminar of Juche Idea Followers on Global Independence and Peace Held
articles.content:
Mexican National Seminar of Juche Idea Followers on Global Independence and Peace Held
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national seminar of Juche idea followers on global independence and peace took place in Mexico City on July 16.
					 Present there were personages of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other Juche idea study organizations, lawmakers and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers explained Marshal Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of the Central Committee, saying that the great victory of the Juche idea and Songun politics means that of ideology and guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The seminar discussed the issue of conducting brisk activities for the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in order to arm the popular masses with independent idea.
					
					 At letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 The letter said that the DPRK has achieved victories one after another in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation and triumphantly advanced the socialist cause and laid a solid foundation for its accomplishment, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un. This successes and experience serve as a powerful driving force for the progressives struggling for an independent, peaceful and prosperous new world, it noted, adding:
					
					 We will actively support the Korean people in their struggle to build a powerful socialist country where independent ideal and dream of the popular masses came true and to achieve independent reunification of the country while bravely meeting the unprecedented challenges with single-minded unity around Kim Jong Un in the self-development-first principle.

articles.title: Syria Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Syria Supports Korean People's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of Syria issued a statement on July 13 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The Syrian Arab Republic is standing by the DPRK struggling for defending the independent right of the people, the statement said, denouncing the U.S. for its unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a violation of the sovereignty of the Korean people, it noted, supporting the DPRK's principled stand to defend the country's dignity and achieve the independent reunification of the country.  
					
					 It opposed the THAAD deployment in south Korea, adding that the north and the south of Korea should achieve peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula through dialogue.

articles.title: Russian Internet News Service Discloses U.S. Imperialists' Crimes
articles.content:
Russian Internet News Service Discloses U.S. Imperialists' Crimes
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet news Primorski Reporzor on July 15 laid bare atrocious crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists during the past Korean war.
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists indiscriminately bombed the whole part of Korea and brutally massacred its innocent people during the war.
					
					 They also didn't hesitate to use weapons of mass destruction including germ and chemical weapons.
					
					 Their atrocities during the Korean war were unheard-of in their cruelty.
					
					 They, who inflicted untold misfortune and pain on the Korean nation, have occupied south Korea, infringed upon its people's sovereignty and dignity and ruthlessly murdered them.
					
					 They are working hard to ignite a war again on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Korean people will never forget the misfortune and pain imposed by the U.S. imperialists but take a thousand-fold revenge on them.

articles.title: MINREX condena a EE.UU. que cuestiona ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes del EPC
articles.content:
MINREX condena a EE.UU. que cuestiona ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes del EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- En entrevista con la ACNC ofrecida el dia 21 con respecto a que Estados Unidos cuestiono el ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos ejecutado por el Ejercito Popular de Corea, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta: 
					En cuanto al entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos realizado por las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, las figuras oficiales de la Casa Blanca, el Departamento de Estado y el Pentagono de EE.UU. dicen palabras absurdas como la "violacion de resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y el "acto provocativo". 
					
					Es un acto de bandido esta acusacion sobre el rutinario entrenamiento militar del EPC.
					
					Antes de acusar a otros, EE.UU. debe pensar primero que sus propiedades estrategicas de diversos tipos introducidas en el suelo surcoreano amenazan seriamente a nuestro pais. 
					
					El incesante aumento armamentista de EE.UU. y sus entrenamientos de guerra nuclear son precisamente la amenaza verdadera a la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y una violacion evidente de la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales.
					
					Al igual que el bandido que ofende primero al dueno de la casa asaltada, EE.UU. censura nuestras justas contramedidas de caracter autodefensivo, lo cual constituye intolerable provocacion. 
					
					En visperas del entrenamiento militar conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian a efectuarse en agosto que viene, ese pais agrava constantemente el estado de tension en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					No hay garantia de que ese entrenamiento no extienda a la guerra nuclear.
					
					Si EE.UU. intenta desatar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana a pesar de nuestras advertencias reiteradas, sufrira el inmediato, implacable y anonadante ataque nuclear.
					
					Algunos paises, que quieren sumarse a EE.UU., deberan contribuir a la preservacion de paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, al tomar una posicion imparcial a base del entendimiento correcto de la esencia de la situacion.

articles.title: MINREX critica el dicho de premier britanica sobre "amenaza nuclear" de RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX critica el dicho de premier britanica sobre "amenaza nuclear" de RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la primera ministra de Gran Bretana se refirio a la "amenaza nuclear" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de esta dio el dia 20 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Antes de la votacion sobre el programa de construccion del submarino nuclear estrategico de ultimo modelo, celebrada recientemente en el parlamento, la premier de Gran Bretana dijo que su pais "recibe la amenaza nuclear real de algunos paises como Rusia y el Norte de Corea".
					
					Causa sorpresa este dicho.
					
					Es absurdo que nuestras armas nucleares constituyeran una amenaza a Gran Bretana.
					
					Que construya el submarino nuclear si quiere hacerlo, pero no cometa el acto pobrecito de acusar a nuestro pais a miles de kilometros para buscarse pretexto.
					
					En la pasada decada de 1950, Gran Bretana despacho a sus tropas a la guerra coreana y por eso, ambos paises se pelearon. Pero, no consideramos como enemigo al pais europeo porque despues establecimos con el hasta las relaciones diplomaticas a base del respeto mutuo e igualdad.
					
					Puesto que la RPDC no considera como amenaza las armas nucleares de Gran Bretana, este pais tampoco tiene la necesidad de tomar nuestras armas nucleares como amenaza.
					
					Al igual que Gran Bretana necesita esos armamentos para proteger las generaciones actuales y venideras, la RPDC tambien fortalece el disuasivo nuclear a fin de defenderse desde la real y extremada amenaza de guerra nuclear proveniente de Estados Unidos.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, seguiremos consolidando el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo para salvaguardar la soberania del pais y el derecho a vivir de la nacion desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.

articles.title: CRPP condena palabras de Park Geun-hye dichas en ASEM
articles.content:
CRPP condena palabras de Park Geun-hye dichas en ASEM
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- En la reunion cumbre Asia-Europa (ASEM) efectuada hace poco en Mongolia, Park Geun-hye dijo en varias ocasiones unos chismes tales como "la desnuclearizacion del Norte (de Corea)" y "se debe inducir el cambio correcto del Norte". Ademas, realizo la sucia campana de solicitar la cooperacion en presionar al Norte abogando por "cumplir las medidas de sancion".
					El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, en una declaracion publicada el dia 21, opina que los disparates de esa malvada, enviciada de vetar y hostilizar a la parte connacional, demuestran de nuevo su naturaleza conflictiva y no pasan de ser una repeticion de su asquerosa conducta de que ha sido testigo la sociedad internacional cada vez que ella visita a los paises extranjeros.
					
					Despues de la toma del poder, la mandataria surcoreana realizo en mas de 20 veces la visita al extranjero, recuerda el documento y prosigue:
					
					En esas ocasiones, ella repitio su estereotipado disparate conflictivo para criticar a la parte connacional, sin importar quien es su interlocutor ni el tema de la reunion.
					
					A pesar del comportamiento extravagante de Park Geun-hye, nuestro disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo se ha consolidado como arma poderosa, que garantiza la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion frustrando los desafios desesperados de las fuerzas hostiles y defiende la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico, y esta al punto de fracaso la "cooperacion" internacional anti-RPDC, abogada tanto por ella. Esto es la realidad de hoy.
					
					De hecho, la ultima visita al extranjero de Park debe ser calificada de huida para eludir las protestas y condenas de la opinion publica surcoreana, enojada por la humillante decision sobre el emplazamiento de THAAD en suelo surcoreano.
					
					La traidora, que convirtio el suelo surcoreano en un campo de danza macabra y calumnio en varios paises a la parte connacional, es rompecabezas y ente canceroso para todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que deben eliminarla cuanto antes. 
					
					Es miserable la situacion de ella que no sabe que su conducta es ridiculizada y repudiada por la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que Park, quien se encuentra en la crisis de arruinamiento, haya expuesto publicamente su intento de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" disparateando que la unificacion es la "via para recuperar la libertad y derechos humanos" de alguien y el "punto de partida de un mundo sin armas nucleares".
					
					La RPDC tiene la firme posicion de librar la justa guerra de reunificacion para aniquilar implacablemente a los provocadores y lograr a su manera la reunificacion, si los titeres surcoreanos desatan la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC bajo el amparo de EE.UU. y con la vana ilusion sobre la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					Es natural que la poblacion surcoreana reclamara la retirada pronta del abominable poder de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Le espera a la traidora, que abulta su expediente criminal, la severa sentencia de la historia.

articles.title: Camarilla de Park Geun-hye no puede ocultar la verdad de secuestro, insiste entidad norcoreana
articles.content:
Camarilla de Park Geun-hye no puede ocultar la verdad de secuestro, insiste entidad norcoreana
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los titeres surcoreanos mantienen apartadas a las ciudadanas norcoreanas, secuestradas forzadamente, con el pretexto de la "seguridad personal" de sus familiares, el portavoz del Comite de Medidas Emergentes para el Rescate a las Victimas de Secuestro Forzado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 21 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Hace poco, las entidades progresistas del Sur de Corea, incluso la Union de Abogados por una Sociedad Democratica, y una organizacion de los DDHH de la ONU pidieron la entrevista con las ciudadanas norcoreanas que fueron secuestradas en colectivo. 
					
					Pero, los titeres surcoreanos negaron esa peticion pretextando la "seguridad personal" de los familiares de victimas, y por otra parte, instigan a las escorias humanas a pronunciar disparate, segun el cual si se dan a la publicidad las "mujeres que salieron voluntariamente del Norte (de Corea)", se pondra en peligro la seguridad de sus familiares en el Norte. 
					
					Es una sofisteria para ocultar la verdad de su escalofriante crimen de rapto colectivo. 
					
					A peticion encarecida de los familiares de victimas, hemos exigido fuertemente en varias ocasiones a las autoridades surcoreanas que permitan el viaje de aquellos a Seul por via de Phanmunjom para encontrarse con sus hijas. 
					
					Ahora ellos solicitan reiteradamente el encuentro con sus hijas expresando gran indignacion de los titeres surcoreanos que siguen reteniendolas por la fuerza hablando de la "fuga colectiva del Norte con la voluntad libre". 
					
					No obstante, los titeres surcoreanos ofenden a aquellos pretextando la "seguridad personal" que no pasa de ser un embuste barato para manchar la imagen de la muy digna RPDC. 
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos no hubieran secuestrado a la fuerza a las ciudadanas norcoreanas, no tendrian la razon de no presentarlas todavia a mas de 3 meses del incidente ni negar la peticion de entrevista a puertas cerradas de las entidades internacionales de DDHH. 
					
					Como se ha revelado a traves de la reciente conferencia de prensa con un lacayo del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, detenido por sus actos hostiles anti-RPDC, los titeres surcoreanos recurren a la campana intrigante anti-RPDC enganando a la opinion publica como si fueran "fugitivos voluntarios" los moradores norcoreanos secuestrados con engano y seduccion. 
					
					Aunque los titeres surcoreanos pretextan la "seguridad personal" de los familiares de victimas a fin de justificar su crimen de tenerlas apartadas y encarceladas, no pueden ocultar nunca su asquerosa naturaleza de terroristas internacionales y criminales anti-DDHH. 
					
					Es imperdonable el crimen antietico y antinacional de la camarilla surcoreana que separa forzadamente a los padres y sus hijas y utiliza a estas en la intriga de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben dejar de inmediato los insoportables maltratos mentales y fisicos y la operacion de "sumision" sobre las secuestradas y devolverlas sin falta a la patria. 
					
					Tomaremos de continuo las medidas para revelar la verdad del secuestro colectivo y lograr sin falta la devolucion de nuestras ciudadanas.
